title: Textile, "Circle Square II", ca. 1995–98
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: Triple-layered plain weave in wool, cut, felted, and dyed.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 424.2 x 53.3 cm (13 ft. 11 in. x 21 in.)
creditline: Gift of The Museum of Modern Art, courtesy of the designer
description:
Front: Dark blue felted wool and regularly spaced light blue, puckered, circular pockets that have a protruding dark blue yarn in the center.
Reverse: Dark blue felted wool and light blue inscribed circle with dark blue center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Circle Square II", ca. 1995–98. Medium: wool
Technique: Triple-layered plain weave in wool, cut, felted, and dyed.. Gift of The Museum of Modern Art, courtesy of the designer. 2002-17-1.
